creditline: Gift of Sue Y.S. Kimm and Seymour Grufferman
description: black diagonal form with linear red accents LLQ; parallel beige form and overlapping gray streak with rubbed texture also LLQ; two thick, crisscrossed diagonal brushstrokes near C of image, with tip overlapping in forms at L; thin white and ochre accent in brushstroke
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Blessing C
